General.Text: Caller is worried about the pet
Drive to the ~b~~h~Caller~h~~s~ to learn more about the missing pet.

Tasks.Text: Press {Key} to speak to the person.
A report of a person being attacked by an animal came in!
Attempt to ~y~tase~s~ the pet to ~o~stop~s~ the attack!
Drive to the caller and give him/her an update.
Press ~y~J~s~ to ~r~teleport~s~ the pet in your vehicle!
~r~First get into a vehicle,~s~ then try again.

TasksAccident.Text: A person found a {PetTypeAsNormalWord} and reported it.
Drive to the location where the pet was found.
Call a ~b~~h~coroner~h~~s~ for the animal, then drive to the ~b~~h~caller~h~~s~ again.

CallerGeneral.Dialogue: Hello! I can't find my pet!
It has been missing for {min} minutes, but it must be nearby!
Oh, sorry, it's a {PetTypeAsNormalWord}, and its name is {PetName}.
It just slipped away! Please find it!

DriverAccident1.Dialogue: The animal ran in front of my car! I had no chance to avoid it!
My car is damaged too! Can you call me a taxi and tow truck?

DriverAccident2.Dialogue: Hello Officer, I'm so sorry, I was only driving when this animal ran across the street.
I wasn't able to react on time. Damn it.
As long as you are fine, everything is ok. Your vehicle is ok, too.
Thanks for the report, I will notify the owner then. Drive safe.

CallerReturnAccident1.Dialogue: Hello, I'm back with bad news.
The animal was hit by a car and didn't survive.
Oh, that's sad, but the pet wasn't mine; it belonged to my neighbors.
My neighbors will hate me forever, oh no...
Still, thanks for letting me know!
Oh no, have a good day anyway!

CallerReturnAccident2.Dialogue: And... have you found the pet?
I'm sorry, but your pet was overdriven by accident. Somebody just reported that.
Oh damn it... It wasn't my pet, my neighbors are on holidays and I took over...
Is there anything else I can do for you?
No thank you... damn... how should I explain this...

DriverAttackSafed1.Dialogue: Omg, thank you for saving me!
I was minding my own business when suddenly this animal came straight at me!
No problem, I'm glad you're safe.
Thank you, have a nice day!

CallerAttackReturnPetAlive2.Dialogue: Hey, I've brought your pet back!
Awesome, thank you! Where have you been, {PetName}?
I can tell you, your pet attacked an innocent civilian!
Oh, I'm so sorry, I hope he's not badly hurt.
I need your details such as I.D and I will file a report.
As soon as it's finished, you're free to go.

CallerAttackReturnPetDead2.Dialogue: Hello, I have bad news for you. Unfortunately your pet attacked a civilian.
I was forced to use lethal force, the pet is deceased.
Oh okay, I am so sorry, I hope the person is not hurt?
For the future I will be more careful with my pets.
Most important is that everyone is safe. Have a good day.

End.Text: Press ~y~End~s~ anytime to end the callout.
